content: X-HS W U Threaded rod hanger with nail Ceiling hanger for attaching threaded rod ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy-to-use, cordless system – up to 10 times quicker than drilling and with less vibration Ideal for use with the X-PT pole tool – for faster, less tiring and scaffold-free overhead work Applications Attaching threaded rod Attaching pipes, air ducts, lighting fixtures, suspended ceilings, etc. For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Suspended systems Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Suspended systems | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Steel | Approvals | COLA, FM, ICC-ES, UL | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Length | 36 mm | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 386221 -
